page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: {Education}for all children in England is both free and compulsory. In the Southampton area children begin their education at{First Schools}when they are 5 years old. When a child is eight years old it moves to a{Middle School}for a higher grade of education and when the child is between 12 and 13 it moves to an {Upper School}until it is at least 16. But outside the Southampton area, yet still in Hampshire, the child begins its education at an Infant school at 5 and leaves to continue at a Junior School at 7.It leaves the Primary sector at II and then finishes its education at a secondary school. Parts of this area are in Southampton (Mansbridge etc.), and parts in Hampshire County (West End etc.) so both education systems operate!
